directions: Combine first 10 ingredients in a bowl and mash with a fork. Taste and adjust seasoning. Fold in the cilantro, sprinkle with additional Aleppo, and serve.
ingredients: 3 cloves garlic, poached in hot water for 2 minutes and minced
1 to 2 jalapeño peppers (depending on heat), stemmed, seeded, and minced
1/4 cup finely chopped red onion, rinsed in cool water and drained
1/8 teaspoon Aleppo pepper, plus more for garnish
title: Guacamole with Aleppo Pepper
